tasks.title: Turbocharge the runner burst lane
tasks.description: Trim the queue latency between chained Python and Node runs so Echo Computer feels instantaneous again.
steps: Trace a full multi-language request and log when each container starts, streams, and tears down.
Patch the scheduler so idle sandboxes pre-warm, then rerun a dual-language script to confirm the burst.
Capture the before/after timings plus the command you used inside your workspace journal.

tasks.title: Compose the aurora luminary overlay
tasks.description: Design a gradient overlay card that communicates palette + soundtrack cues without covering the terminal.
steps: Draft a JSON stub under `overlays/luminary.json` with color, audio, and copy references.
Prototype the overlay in HTML/CSS or ASCII art directly inside the workspace to feel the motion.
Annotate how the overlay should react to run success/failure inside the mock file.

tasks.title: Broadcast the ground-station handoff kit
tasks.description: Bundle commands, logs, and reviewer radar notes so another Echo operator can resume the upgrade immediately.
steps: List the critical files touched today plus `npm`/`python` commands to replay the run.
Highlight at least two ideal reviewers with reasons (recent commits, subsystem familiarity, etc.).
Share the kit path + summary link inside the Echo Computer feed or your preferred ops channel.

tasks.title: Run the cloud signal healthcheck
tasks.description: Validate Echo Computer's cloud endpoints, tracing latency + error budgets before the next upgrade.
steps: Ping each public endpoint and record latency + status into `cloud/healthcheck.json`.
Capture a short log tail from the worker pods to confirm no silent retries or throttling.
Summarize drift or regressions in the ops journal with a link to the collected metrics.
